sentences.en: " It is arguable that Boys - like girls should be labelled as " problem students " . "
sentences.cn: 然而把男性化的女生贴上 “ 问题学生 ” 的标签,却令人难以理解.

sentences.en: Administration and Administrative Law both are basic and academically arguable concepts.
sentences.cn: 行政与行政法是行政法学上两个最具基础性的,同时也是存在一定学术争议的概念范畴.

sentences.en: He said that her remarks disgusted every practising Christian. That claim is arguable.
sentences.cn: 他说她的言论让每个虔诚的基督教信徒感到厌恶。这种说法存在疑问。

sentences.en: It is arguable that giving too much detail may actually be confusing.
sentences.cn: 过分详细反而使人糊涂的说法是有道理的。

sentences.en: It is arguable that this was not as grave a handicap as it might appear.
sentences.cn: 有证据表明，这种残障不如看起来那么严重。

sentences.en: It is arguable that we would be just as efficient with fewer staff.
sentences.cn: 我们的职员少一些也能发挥同样效率,这是言之成理的.

sentences.en: It is arguable whether he ever had much control over the real economic power.
sentences.cn: 他是否掌控过真正的经济大权还有待证实。

sentences.en: It is arguable whether the rebels will knuckle under.
sentences.cn: 还不能确定反叛者是否会投降。

sentences.en: That their decision was the best one arguable.
sentences.cn: 若说他们的决定是最好的那就有疑问.

sentences.en: The threats in Iraq, Iran, and elsewhere, have arguable grown worse since last year.
sentences.cn: 自从去年开始,伊拉克, 伊朗和世界其它地方对石油供应的威胁在一片争议声中不断扩大.

sentences.en: There are gaps in our knowledge and some conclusions are arguable.
sentences.cn: 我们的知识还有欠缺之处,有些结论也有争议.

sentences.en: Therefore, the legitimation of these regulations becomes an arguable issue.
sentences.cn: 因此这些管制的合法化就变成了争论的议题.

sentences.en: This account contains many arguable statements.
sentences.cn: 这种说法含有很多疑点.

sentences.en: This topic is as arguable as religion, politics and sex.
sentences.cn: 这个话题像宗教 、 政治和性一样有争论.

sentences.en: Yet, if achievable, arguable that significant benefits could be gained.
sentences.cn: 然而, 如果可达到, 有人认为可能被获得显著的好处.

words.tran_cn: 可论证地；可争辩地；正如可提出证据加以证明的那样地
论证；论据；争吵；内容提要
可论证的；可议的；可疑的

trans.tran_en: If you say that it is arguable that something is true, you believe that it can be supported by evidence and that many people would agree with it
